air.title: Air quality
air.tooltip: Foreign smells (from fields, factories, etc.). How nice to breathe.
air.caption: 1 - bad, 5 - awesome

water.title: Water quality
water.tooltip: Water problems (smell, taste, color, itching). How good it is.
water.caption: 1 - terrible, 5 - good

logistic.title: Basic and social facilities
logistic.tooltip: The number and quality of shops, cafes, entertainment facilities, hairdressers, gyms, etc. nearby.
logistic.caption: 1 - awful, 5 - great

transport.title: Transport and location
transport.tooltip: How easy it is to get to the needed places by public or personal transport, bicycle, on foot.
transport.caption: 1 - poor, 5 - nice

noize.title: Light and noise pollution
noize.tooltip: How much noise and light disturbs. 1 - disturbs strongly, 5 - does not disturb.
noize.caption: 1 - noizy, 5 - quietly

clean.title: Cleanliness and tidiness
clean.tooltip: The amount of garbage. Caring for the appearance of the entrances/lawns/areas.
clean.caption: 1 - dirty, 5 - clean

chill.title: Outdoor activities and walks
chill.tooltip: The presence of parks, water, walks and bike paths nearby, as well as their equipment.
chill.caption: 1 - far, 5 - nearby

safety.title: Safety
safety.tooltip: How safe does it feel to live in this area compared to other places.
safety.caption: 1 - anxious, 5 - calmly

pets.title: Life with pets
pets.tooltip: How well tenants treat pets. Walking and training areas.
pets.caption: 1 - tough, 5 - easy

kids.title: Life with kids
kids.tooltip: Infrastructure for children: kindergartens and playgrounds, schools nearby - and security.
kids.caption: 1 - rough, 5 - cool

parking.title: Parking places
parking.tooltip: Parking space problems. 1 - no places, 5 - no problem.
parking.caption: 1 - sad, 5 - terrific

firstSlide.text: Free service we built to help you share your residential experiences and find the best place üè° to rent or buy.

2.title: We are simple and useful
2.text1: We help people by saving time, energy and reducing the stress ü§Ø while looking for a place to stay.
2.text2: Check the districts with good or bad water quality üíß in the town (by townsman's opionion) in literally one click from now.

3.title: We are community driven
3.text1: There are no thing like promoted rating or paid review here. Content created for people by people.
3.text2: Become the creator. We will help you üëã

4.title: We are non-commercial
4.text1: We would love your support, but making the money is not the goal of this service.
4.text2: There are more important things in life üåº

5.title: We are privacy oriented
5.text1: Do not trust our words üôà Trust our code üôâ It is open source.
5.text2: We can't sell or lose your personal data because we don't collect it üôä

list.text: Find the rest at our blog

lastSlide.title: And this is only the beggining

startScreen.checkboxText: By using Measureland I agree with

clusters.titleGrp: This group of places average rating's about

filterSidebar.title: Set up filters
filterSidebar.footerText1: Do you like our free features without any ads?
filterSidebar.footerText2: , so we can keep it that way!
filterSidebar.footerTextSmall: (73% of those surveyed agreed to support Measureland)

timelinePoint.clickToExpand: Average rating from the user is {0}. Click to expand.

quizPopup.soYouWantToRate: So you want to rate the place. Before we start, there is one important question to answer. We expect an honest answer, thank you!
quizPopup.doYouHavePersonalExperience: Do you have personal experience of living at the given place?
quizPopup.imageTitle: Picture of a crowd looking at you
quizPopup.beSincere: Be sincere. Help us and we will help you back!
quizPopup.tenCriteria: Great, thanks. There are about ten criteria you will need to rate in order to submit your rating. You can skip and return later, there is an opportunity to leave a comment at the end. Let's start with
quizPopup.timelineSelectTitle: How old the knowledge you based on your answer is? It's important to know how relevant it is.
quizPopup.timelineSelectOption1: My info is maximum 2 years old (accurate)
quizPopup.timelineSelectOption2: My info is 2 - 7 years old (somehow accurate)
quizPopup.timelineSelectOption3: My info is more then 7 years old (not accurate)
quizPopup.isThereAnythingToAdd: Is there anything you'd like to add?

showRatingPopup.howMuchPeople: How much people are actually lived here
showRatingPopup.youHaveAlreadyRated: You have already rated this place

howToRatePopup.soYouWantTo: So you want to measure land
howToRatePopup.findNeededTown: Find a needed town (search at the top left)
howToRatePopup.lookForPlace: Look for a place where you have experience of living
howToRatePopup.clickIt: Click it! Or touch the screen
howToRatePopup.rateAllCriteria: Rate all criteria in the appeared modal

loggedInPopup.learnWhyLimits: Learn why there are limits and how to increase this number
loggedInPopup.learnWhyLimitsAddition: It's free, we just need to confirm you're a nice person :)
loggedInPopup.hereSomeArticles: Here are some articles to help you get started or remind about

onboardingPopup.title: Thank you for registration!
onboardingPopup.caption: You'll help us by answering this two simple questions (deafault values applied if skipped), and we would help you if you were looking for a new place to live in the future :)
onboardingPopup.yourName: Your name. If skipped, you're going to appear as ¬´{0}¬ª in the comments

confirmForgotPasswordPopup.title: Check your email
confirmForgotPasswordPopup.text: We sent a letter to the given email. By clicking the link inside you'll get to the new password form. Once you submit new password, old one stops to work

checkEmailPopup.title: Check your email
checkEmailPopup.text: One of the stages in fighting with cheating - verification of users by email - so we sent a letter to you. We know you can't wait to start rating the places, so once you confirm yourself you can start. Check it out :)

myPlacesPopup.title: Your ratings
myPlacesPopup.youHaveNotRated: You have not rated anything yet. Find a familiar place, click the map and rate!

askForMoreRatingsPopup.title: Done
askForMoreRatingsPopup.weProcessingRequest: We're processing your request now. Can not guarantee to resolve it fast - our team is tiny right now, but the amount of work is tremendous.
askForMoreRatingsPopup.limitationsExist: These limitations exist as one of the layers of protection.
askForMoreRatingsPopup.youCanTryFasten: You can try to fasten this process, write us an email:

input.passwordError: Password should be longer than 6 characters!

limitError.textBeforeLink: You have exceeded our limit of requests. There are
limitError.textBetweenLinks: : either you a bad guy who for some reason wants our aimed at our helping people service going down or our system being not ideal. We are strongly believe it's a second one. If you
limitError.textAfterLinks: we would have an opportunity to become better. But for now you need to wait a little to enter Measureland again. Sorry for the inconvenience.

errors.samePass: The pass is the same as previous. Pick another one.
errors.manyAttempts: Too many attempts, wait a bit!
errors.nearbyPlaceAlreadyRated: Nearby place is already rated by you
errors.sessionExpired: Session expired, please, refresh and login.
errors.youRateTooOften: You spent all the ratings. We'll add some in a few days.
errors.noResponseFromServer: Unfortunately, there is no response from the server. Try later or contact us:

SEO.title: Welcome to Measureland
SEO.description: Looking to buy a house, rent an apartment or searching for a place to stay? Check the neighbourhood first!
SEO.keywords: Measureland, rate, Non-commerical, Open-source, service, Roman Smunyov, RomanistHere, independent, real estate, map, ratings
SEO.subject: Help people to find the best place to stay at or live in.
SEO.author: Roman Smunyov
